name: Block Puzzle Color
description:
Challenge your friends and the world with the popular Block puzzle game.

Some advanteges:

  • Improve memory.
  • Fun and entertaining.
  • Suitable for all ages.
  • Increase IQ.
  • Collected Coins.
  • Leaderboard.
  • Challenge with your Friends.
  • Play with your Family.
  • You can use auxiliary tools (Bomb, Rocket ....)
  •  Nice Color.
  • Offline Game.
